author: Tyler Oleary
comment: This does actually work, despite what the other reviews are saying. The moving parts are smooth, and I had no problem downloading it.
title: Love the moving bits

author: Jorge Rodriguez
comment: I can't get this watch face to show up and work on my moto 360. It says it's installed in Google play but nothing on the watch
title: Doesn't show up on android wear

author: Charles Richardson
comment: I have a gear s2. How can I get it on my watch ??

reply.author: MR.TIME LAB
reply.content:
Hi. We are MR.TIME.

If you already have a Samsung phone, the Samsung Gear - Samsung Gear Apps - its application Search

You can download the above procedure.

If you are not a Samsung phone, but I would note that there can not be purchased due to platform issues.

Additional inquiries, please contact mrtimemaker@apposter.com.

Thank you.

title: How can I get it on my watch...??
